name: Learn Japanese - 6000 Essential Words
description: Learn vocabulary more easily than ever with app Learn Japanese - 6000 Essential Words!  You can easily memorize these words through thousands of vivid illustrations divided into many topics. Besides, dont forget to consolidate what youve learned by playing POROs interesting games!   Learn Japanese - 6000 Essential Words gives you a rich vocabulary source presented by pictures that makes it easier for you to memorize than reading plain definition words. Moreover, these words designed as flashcards along with the standard audio pronunciation of native speakers will help you to memorize the visual, meaning and pronunciation of the words. You can also adjust the speed of the audio to suit your level. In addition, by choosing the right image for the correct pronunciation within a limited time, PORO memory training games will help you train the ability to reflex when learning a new word effectively.    More than 10 essential topics in life are divided into smaller lessons with a wide range of words will enrich your vocabulary significantly. By splitting words into small lessons in a large topic will help you classify your vocabulary in a systematic and scientific way.    Lets start studying vocabulary in a fun and effective way with Learn Japanese - 6000 Essential Words now!  Main functions:  - Learn vocabulary by small lessons in each topic  - Illustrated by vivid images  - Full English  Vietnamese translation  - Provide romanji scripts for beginners  - Standard audio pronunciation of native speakers   - Desiged in easy-to-learn flashcards  - Included interesting games to train reflexes effectively   * The application is suitable for people who is  - Learning Japanese from basic to advanced   - Practicing JLPT  - Interested in Japan and want to learn Japanese   During the development of Learn Japanese - 6000 Essential Words, our team possibly make mistakes so we are looking forward to receiving constructive comments from everyone.
